How do I stop dhclient from populating t: i removed the 'resolvconf' package to achieve that, not sure it's a reasonable route, and ymmv. maybe you could also just set -w resolv.conf
I'm sure I stumbled upon some way to stop dhclient from touching it, but can't find anything in the man pages.. Will try to dig deeper.
supersede domain-name-servers 127.0.0.1; in /etc/dhclient.conf was the trick :)
